name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of full stack development experience, specializing in high-performance applications with a strong focus on **PHP**, **Node.js**, **Python**, and **React**. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **MySQL**, **DynamoDB**, **Redis**, and cloud services such as **AWS** to deliver robust solutions. Skilled in building scalable and secure systems using **Microservices** and **SaaS** architectures, alongside effective **System Design** practices.

Notable achievements include the integration of **Docker** for containerization and **GitActions** for CI/CD workflows, streamlining development processes. I have extensive experience with testing frameworks like **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PHPUnit** to ensure high-quality code output. Highly collaborative, fluent in English, and recognized for strong **Problem Solving** abilities that foster innovative solutions in agile environments.

In previous roles, I have led teams in developing enterprise applications while aligning with key compliance standards and integrating advanced technologies such as AI/ML for enhanced functionality.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed scalable, high-performance applications leveraging **Node.js**, **Python**, and **TypeScript** to meet user needs in a timely manner.
- Employed modern frameworks like **React** and **Tailwind CSS** for creating dynamic web interfaces, with attention to usability and accessibility, adapting best practices from projects with **React (17-18)**.
- Designed and implemented microservices architecture using **Docker** and cloud-native environments on **AWS** for building resilient applications that enhance application performance and reliability, achieving a **99.9% uptime**.
- Integrated real-time data storage solutions utilizing **MySQL**, **DynamoDB**, and **Redis** for high-speed data retrieval and manipulation, accommodating increasing data volumes with a focus on performance optimization.
- Applied CI/CD practices using **GitHub Actions** for automated testing using tools like **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PHPUnit**, enabling rapid deployment cycles and maintaining high code quality across **100%** of services.
- Championed collaborative problem-solving sessions to improve system design processes resulting in a **20% reduction** in development time across several projects.
- Drove the transition to serverless architectures and optimized backend systems with **RabbitMQ** for messaging, enhancing scalability and reducing costs by **30%**.
- Maintained documentation and participated in code reviews to foster an environment of continuous learning and improvement while promoting adherence to coding standards.
- Successfully led workshops on best practices for SaaS applications, guiding the team in achieving compliance with industry standards and protocols.
- Fostered collaborative communication with cross-functional teams to deliver projects on time and within budget, ensuring alignment with business objectives.

• Designed and implemented scalable microservices utilizing **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to enhance performance and maintainability for high-volume financial transaction systems.
• Engineered front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, employing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to optimize user experiences across financial dashboards and admin portals.
• Developed and deployed real-time analytics dashboards utilizing **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, providing insights on financial activity, including anomaly detection with a 10% increase in operational efficiency for team alerts.
• Implemented an event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring reliable asynchronous communication and processing for up to 100,000 transactions per second.
• Constructed and managed ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, handling both batch and real-time data ingestion from various internal and third-party sources to support data-driven decisions.
• Designed AI/ML-driven fraud detection frameworks utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, significantly reducing fraudulent activities by over 30% through pattern recognition and user behavior analysis.
• Developed machine learning pipelines for applications including credit scoring and churn prediction using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating real-time model inference into backend services to enhance decision-making processes.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and ensuring alignment of technical solutions with business objectives while maintaining fluent communication in English.

Developed and optimized backend services using **PHP**, **Node.js** and **Python** to ensure high availability and scalability across *e-commerce* platforms, successfully handling an average of **100,000** transactions per day.
Engineered microservices architecture that supports the deployment of **Docker** containers, enabling flexible, low-latency operations and close to **99.9%** uptime.
Designed and maintained distributed databases including **MySQL**, **DynamoDB**, and **Redis**, implementing efficient caching strategies that improved data retrieval speeds by **30%** during peak traffic.
Developed responsive frontend features utilizing **React** and **TypeScript**, achieving a **95%** page load speed score and enhancing user engagement metrics significantly across mobile and desktop platforms.
Integrated CI/CD pipelines using **GitActions** for seamless code deployments, reducing deployment times from **2 hours** to **15 minutes**, and ensuring code quality through test automation frameworks such as **Jest** and **Cypress**.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to define business requirements and translate them into technical specifications, fostering a problem-solving environment that improved project delivery timelines by **20%**.
Implemented and managed cloud services with **AWS**, leading to optimized resource usage and a cost reduction of **25%** in hosting expenses.
Designed and implemented security measures including role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards like GDPR across the platform.
Conducted code reviews and mentored junior developers, promoting best practices in *system design* and efficient code maintenance within a collaborative team setting.
